item.name: Number of agents waiting to work
Database {$DSN1} - Overall bufferpool data hit ratio
item.params: select case POOL_DATA_L_READS when 0 then 1 else (POOL_DATA_L_READS * 1. - POOL_DATA_P_READS * 1.) / POOL_DATA_L_READS end *100. from sysibmadm.snapdb

item.name: Database {$DSN1} - Overall bufferpool temporary data hit ratio
item.params: select case POOL_TEMP_DATA_L_READS when 0 then 1 else (POOL_TEMP_DATA_L_READS * 1. - POOL_TEMP_DATA_P_READS * 1.) / POOL_TEMP_DATA_L_READS end * 100. from sysibmadm.snapdb;

item.name: Database {$DSN1} - Overall bufferpool temporary index hit ratio
item.params: select case POOL_TEMP_INDEX_L_READS when 0 then 1 else (POOL_TEMP_INDEX_L_READS * 1. - POOL_TEMP_INDEX_P_READS * 1.) / POOL_TEMP_INDEX_L_READS end * 100 from sysibmadm.snapdb;

item.name: Database {$DSN1} - Total connections to the database since database start
Database {$DSN1} - Number of dynamic SQL statements /s
Number of connections to the instance
Database {$DSN1} - Time of the last database backup
Database {$DSN1} - Percentage of sorts in overflow
item.params: select TRUNC(case TOTAL_SORTS when 0 then 0 else SORT_OVERFLOWS *1. / TOTAL_SORTS *1. end * 100.,2) from sysibmadm.snapdb;

item.name: Database {$DSN1} - Number of static SQL statements /s
DB2 version
item.params: select service_level concat ' FP' concat fixpack_num from sysibmadm.env_inst_info

item.name: Database {$DSN1} - Number of lock escalations in exclusive mode

trigger.name: DB2 - Sem conexão com o banco {$DSN1}
